Important: Haircolor and bleaches contain ingredients which may cause allergic and/or other types of reactions. A skin allergy test is required 48 hours before each use of a haircolor product. Bleaches contain persulfates. Bleaches and high-lift haircolor shades cannot be used on relaxed hair; for other haircolor shades, wait at least 14 days after bleaching, relaxing or perming before coloring. This is a safety summary. Read all product labeling and instructions completely prior to use.

description:
What's a perfect twist out? It's a twist out that lasts, is soft to the touch and full of shine. This creamy custard is the way to achieve it! It's light enough to layer without weighing hair down and thick enough to hold natural styles without leaving behind a sticky, flaky residue. It's infused with Pracaxi Oil - the conditioning "miracle" nectar of Brazil - Açai Extract and Shea Butter to help give hair flexible control and a shiny finish. Set up your curls to be healthy - looking and beautiful.

Styling by Nature

Apply evenly to clean, damp and detangled hair, working the custard in from root to ends. Use your fingers to style your two-strand twists, Bantu knots or any other style. Air-dry or speed up drying time by sitting under a dryer or using a blow dryer with a diffuser.

Caution: Keep out of eyes. Not intended for internal use.

description:
Argan Curl Defining Jelly Soft Hold

with Certified Organic Vegetable Glycerin, Sugar Beet Root, Argan Oil, Brazilian Buriti Oil and Vanilla

237 ml (8 fl. oz.)

Non-Flaking  Defines Natural Curl Pattern  Great for Wash n’ Go Styling


Born CurlyTM Argan Curl Defining Jelly beautifully defines curly textures. Smooths the natural curl formation and with just the right level of hold. Provides long-lasting definition and great shine. Non-flaking when used as directed.

Directions:

APPLY AFTER CLEANSING, CONDITIONING AND DETANGLING HAIR.
Apply while hair is still very damp. AVOID RIGOROUS TOWEL-BLOTTING TO MINIMIZE FRIZZ.
Apply Born CurlyTM Argan Leave-In Conditioner & Detangler liberally according to instructions. Detangle.
Smooth on Born CurlyTM Argan Curl Defining Jelly along small sections, from root to tip. As you near the end of each section, define curls by rotating your fingertip to form a coil. (For longer hair, finger-raking or finger-coiling are also ways to define the natural coil/curl pattern.)

Spray hair with water to keep hair damp if it begins to dry before styling is complete.
Allow hair to dry completely to set the definition and avoid frizz. Air Drying Recommended. For older children, able to sit stationery for the time it takes hair to dry, you may use a hood dryer set to a low setting.
Fluff, separate or arrange coils/curls to finesse style if desired, only after hair is completely dry. To re-define curls, simply re-dampen the hair with water and smooth with fingers.
title: As I Am® Born Curly™ Argan Curl Defining Jelly - 8 oz

description:
The barrels are made from 100% tourmaline ceramic, ensuring that heat is evenly distributed throughout the heating rod, thus making it gentler on you hair than traditional wands, which are only coated with ceramic. Tourmaline emits negative charged ions, which do not strip your hair of moisture or oils, but rather act as a smoothing agent and prevent your hair from frizzing.

Choose the 13mm for tight curls, the 19mm for bouncy curls, the 25mm for volume and full curls, and the 32mm to create tumbling soft waves.

Chose the Reverse wands in 18 to 9mm, 25 to 18mm, or 13 to 25mm (from tip to base) to create spiral and tighter curls full of texture.

The Pearl wand is for the adventurous curl-seeker who loves to create different kinds of curls; from long beach curls, to spirals, and even to varying curl sizes thanks to the barrel shape that alternates from 13mm to 25mm.

Packaged in a sturdy black zip case designed to fit each barrel and the base securely in place. Perfect for carrying and travel.

Set Includes:

13mm barrel
19 mm barrel
25 mm barrel
32mm barrel
18 to 9mm reverse barrel
25 to 18mm reverse barrel
13 to 25mm reverse barrel
Pearl barrel
Barrel base

description: Miss Jessie’s understands. You are not quite ready for the “Big Chop” because you want to keep the length of your relaxed hair, but you are ready to go natural. The most bewitching challenge for transitioning from relaxed to natural hair is managing and styling these two very different textures at the same time. What you need is Miss Jessie’s Transitioner’s Magic! This innovative and phthalate-free hair elixir will moisturize your new natural growth, revive and coat your relaxed hair as well fight frizz and prevent curl shrinkage. Why does it work? Transitioner’s Magic is a unique potion that acts as a styler and a leave-in conditioner. Transitioner’s Magic provides super soft hold, natural shine, and needed moisture. It is as easy as “Abracadabra!” For wash n’ go styling simply divide your damp (not wet) hair into six equal sections, then generously apply Transitioner’s Magic to each section making sure to thoroughly coat your hair from root to end.  Then allow curls to air dry or blow dry with the Miss Jessie’s Defrizz Diffuser to encourage a fuller curl.  Presto! Your hair will become soft and shiny. With regular use, Transitioner’s Magic will make your transitional hair presentable and manageable. Wishing you the best  darn transition period! Love, Miss Jessie’s.
title: Miss Jessie's® Transitioner's® Magic - 8.5 fl oz

Aloe Shampoo & Wash
No-Tears Formula  Gentle

with Certified Organic Aloe Vera, Argan Oil, Brazilian Buriti Oil and Vanilla

237 ml (8 fl. oz.)

Sulfate-Free  For Shampoo & Bath  Naturally Fragranced

Born CurlyTM Aloe Shampoo & Wash is perfect for young ones’ hair, scalp and delicate skin. It effectively cleanses while maintaining natural moisture balance. Gentle enough for daily use.

Directions:
Shampoo
Rub ample amount of Born CurlyTM Aloe Shampoo & Wash between palms and gently lather throughout wet hair. Gently massage hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.
For children with very thick, very long hair or for hair prone to tangling, it is recommended that hair be detangled with a wide-tooth comb before rinsing lather from hair.

Bath
Pour a small amount onto warm wet washcloth. Gently cleanse the face and then the body. Rinse well and gently towel blot the skin. Proceed to moisturize with Born CurlyTM Nourishing Hair & Body Oil, Born CurlyTM Shea & Cocoa Butter Balm or a combination of the two.
